caseStudy.title: Whitehorse
caseStudy.subtitle: featured case study
caseStudy.description: Whitehorse, an equestrian luxury brand in Kentucky, needed a digital catalog and ecommerce site for high-value horse gear. Our team delivered a refined D2C Shopify experience that increased online conversions.

description: We focused on showcasing craftsmanship, leather quality, and limited collections using dynamic product photography and storytelling.
Integrated personalized product recommendations powered by machine learning.
Delivered a custom checkout flow with Klarna and Stripe integration.
Deployed localized shipping rules and backend inventory sync.
Developed a brand-forward Shopify theme with React-based enhancements.
Automated abandoned cart recovery with Klaviyo workflows.

process.title: Our design process
process.description: Our strategy focused on high-end feel, fast load times, and scalable commerce.

strategies.title: Prototype
strategies.subtitle: our four step process
strategies.description: Developed interactive product pages with rich media.

strategies.title: Test
strategies.subtitle: our four step process
strategies.description: Ran usability tests with elite clientele.
